casebody.data:
APRIL COURT MDCCXXXVI.

A case was cited by Sr. J. Randolph of Col. Mason’s where it was adjudged the Act of Limitation would run against a Bill of Exchange Contra ejus opinionem meamque quidem See Post Boys ag’t Hoggatt. 75

Jameson v Vawter Appeal Error assigned that the Defendant below offered to demur to the Plaintif’s Evidence being viva voce and the Court would not make the Plaintif join *B52Randolph fr Pit. denied the Authority of Middleton & Baker Cro. Eliz. 751. and cited 1 Inst. 72 & Try. per Pais 418 Per Curiam

The Court should have made the Pit. join or have directed the Jury to find specially

Judgment reversed
